Maps نقشه ها

Interactive Maps were developed by UC Davis using data from the Afghanistan Statistical Yearbook 2011-12, Agriculture Development Report published by the Central Statistics Organization (CSO) of Afghanistan. Depending on your internet connection, some map features may not be available. e-Afghan Ag is not responsible for the information provided on maps not created by UC Davis or e-Afghan Ag.

Content

Reference Maps

Political and General Reference

  • Afghan Province Information Interactive Map (UC Davis)
  • Map of Afghan Administrative Divisions, Province and District Level PDF Map (2.47 MB) (MAIL AIMS)

Demography and Culture

  • 2013 Population Density Map of Afghanistan PDF Map (5.7 MB) and JPEG Map (iMMAP)
  • 2012 Population Density Map of Afghanistan PDF Map (iMMAP)
  • Map of Food Security and Population Growth Projections PDF Map (2 MB) (iMMAP)
  • Selection of Maps about population, language, religion and ethnicity can be found Here (Source: Dr. Michael Izady at Gulf/2000 Maps)
